heading: Meet the coaches leading the movement.
intro: Each Adze coach is a transformation specialist with certifications, empathy, and Chennai grit.

trainers.name: Kevin Antony
trainers.title: Head Coach & Co-founder
trainers.bio: Kevin architected Adze’s functional training system and leads our transformation programs with data-backed progression.

trainers.name: Suriya Prakash
trainers.title: Performance Coach
trainers.bio: Suriya’s high-energy HIIT and kettlebell sessions are legendary. He keeps the room buzzing and your form locked in.

trainers.name: Rohith Menon
trainers.title: Mobility & Recovery Specialist
trainers.bio: Rohith bridges strength and serenity. His yoga flows and mobility labs restore alignment and focus.

trainers.name: Kavin Raj
trainers.title: Strength & Conditioning Coach
trainers.bio: Kavin designs athlete-style conditioning plans with progressive overload and supportive nutrition touchpoints.

highlight.title: Coaches who train alongside you.
highlight.copy: Every Adze coach trains with our community, celebrates milestones, and crafts plans that fit real Chennai lifestyles.
